title: LeaverBuster for BOTS??!!
body: Why is LeaverBuster Penalty taking place for bot games? Especially if you have connection issues, if the player disconnects, then one of the bots drop off too?

replies.body: Because you're still affecting a game with 4 other people. You also don't get penalized unless leaving a game is a common occurrence.

I don't see any leaverbuster penalties from the account you're posting from.  If it was from another account, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll take a look and our player behavior team can offer some context!
